variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: These numbers are the sample/subject numbers assigned by the collecting brain banks.
variable.comment: Colorado-A and B specimens were identified and provided by Greg Owens, University of Colorado.

variable.name: Brain Collection Site
variable.description: Anatomic site of the specimen used in the sequencing runs.
variable.comment: Not available for all specimens and impossible to determine based on the appearance of the specimens.

variable.name: Analyte Type
variable.comment: RNA was extracted using commercial kits from the frozen brain specimens. There was no ribosomal RNA depletion performed.

variable.name: Histological Type
variable.description: Only brain tissue specimens were extracted and analyzed.

variable.name: Tumor
variable.description: Tumor present (= yes)/absent (= no) in examined tissue.
variable.comment: No tumor cells were identified in any of the brain specimens. Some of the donors did have cancer at other sites.
